Html:
Hi there,

the problem is that I am using CzechMapProvider, and sometimes MapProviders.GoogleMap.GetPlacemarks() returns me some short names of streets. For example, searching for "Bratří Čapků, Ústí nad Labem" will return "Bří Čapků, Ústí nad Labem".
So the question is, is there any other way not to use GMapProviders.GoogleMap.GetPlacemarks() and to get address? thanks.
